articles.description: Tottenham were left feeling low after the Super Cup slipped from their grasp against Paris St-Germain - but there are still reasons for new head coach Thomas Frank to be upbeat.
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur: Work to do after Super Cup collapse - but promising signs for Thomas Frank

articles.description: European Champions PSG came from 2-0 down to beat Tottenham on penalties to win Super Cup.
articles.title: PSG vs Tottenham LIVE: European Champions beat Spurs on penalties to win Super Cup

articles.description: Premier League chief executive Richard Masters says there are no plans to play a top-flight match abroad as he discusses a number of issues prior to the start of the season.
articles.title: Premier League chief Richard Masters says no plans for matches abroad

articles.description: Alexander Isak remains determined to leave Newcastle United to join Liverpool but Eddie Howe hopes to "use any adversity or challenge to our benefit".
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Newcastle United staying together before Premier League kick-off

articles.description: Liverpool are closing in on the signing of 18-year-old defender Giovanni Leoni from Parma for a fee of about £26m.
articles.title: Liverpool closing in on deal for Parma defender Giovanni Leoni

articles.description: England batter Joe Root says David Warner's pre-Ashes sledge is "all part of the fun" and believes he is better placed than ever to score his first century in Australia.
articles.title: Joe Root says David Warner sledge 'all part of the fun' of Ashes build-up

articles.description: Seven-time Grand Slam singles champion Venus Williams is set to become the oldest player at a major in 44 years after being given a US Open wildcard.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Venus Williams given wildcard to make Grand Slam return in New York

articles.description: Manchester City could rival Chelsea for RB Leipzig forward Xavi Simons, Brighton want more than £100m for Manchester United target Carlos Baleba, Roma are in talks to sign Aston Villa winger Leon Bailey, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Simons, Baleba, Hojlund, Bailey, Kevin, Dibling, Garnacho

articles.description: Six-time winners Manchester United are drawn to play League Two side Grimsby Town in the EFL Cup second round.
articles.title: Carabao Cup round two draw: Grimsby Town to host Manchester United, Bromley host Wycombe

articles.description: Cricket Australia chief Todd Greenberg warns the traditional Test format could lead to bankruptcy for certain nations and calls for a slimmer schedule.
articles.title: Test cricket could 'bankrupt' nations - Australia CEO Todd Greenberg
